segments.text: The cookie jar is just sitting there, full of temptation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far to reach it, and the stool is wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste the cookies just looking at them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting so patiently for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the cookies are worth the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing so precariously, but he’s determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a childhood memory coming to life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be so surprised when she finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies look so delicious, but the risk is just too high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, but I also hope they don’t get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
